metadata.title: CVE-2021-41990 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The gmp plugin in strongSwan before 5.9.4 has a remote integer overflow viaa crafted certificate with an RSASSA-PSS signature. For example, this canbe triggered by an unrelated self-signed CA certificate sent by aninitiator. Remote code execution cannot occur.

criterions.comment: strongswan package in fips/focal is affected and needs fixing.
